alert.note: Alert for Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 13 at 12:03PM EDT until March 13 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL VOLUSIA COUNTY... At 1202 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Smyrna Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Port Orange, DeLand, New Smyrna Beach and Edgewater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
